 An inference based on modus ponens.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2011.)
statement:
mp4an.1 $e |- ph $.
mp4an.2 $e |- ps $.
mp4an.3 $e |- ch $.
mp4an.4 $e |- th $.
mp4an.5 $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ ps ) /\ ( ch /\ th ) ) -> ta ) $.
mp4an $p |- ta $.
